** {{nbt|boolean|blocked}}: Checks if the damage was successfully blocked.
** {{nbt|double|dealt}}: Checks the amount of incoming damage before damage reduction.
** {{nbt|compound|dealt}}:
*** {{nbt|double|max}}: A maximum value.
*** {{nbt|double|min}}: A minimum value.
** {{nbt|compound|source_entity}}: Checks the entity that was the source of the damage (for example: The skeleton that shot the arrow).
*** {{nbt inherit/conditions/entity}}
** {{nbt|double|taken}}: Checks the amount of incoming damage after damage reduction.
** {{nbt|compound|taken}}:
*** {{nbt|double|max}}: A maximum value.
*** {{nbt|double|min}}: A minimum value.
** {{nbt|compound|type}}: Checks the type of damage done.
*** {{nbt inherit/conditions/damage_type}}
</onlyinclude></div><noinclude>
